unnormalised: Hey guys, so I was wondering, what's the deal with all these different IDs the govt keeps asking for? Like, there's Aadhaar, PAN card, Voter ID...it's kinda confusing! What's the real difference and why do we need so many?

unnormalised: Seriously, every time I try to do something, someone wants a different document. Applying for a bank account? Aadhaar. Filing taxes? PAN. Voting? Voter ID.
